verbs.description: The lowest points of Donald Trump ’s presidency [V: have] tended to occur when a sizable portion of his own party has criticized him for his actions .
[ARG1: The lowest points of Donald Trump ’s presidency] have [V: tended] [ARG2: to occur when a sizable portion of his own party has criticized him for his actions] .
[ARG1: The lowest points of Donald Trump ’s presidency] have tended to [V: occur] [ARGM-TMP: when a sizable portion of his own party has criticized him for his actions] .
The lowest points of Donald Trump ’s presidency have tended to occur when a sizable portion of his own party [V: has] criticized him for his actions .
The lowest points of Donald Trump ’s presidency have tended to occur [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: a sizable portion of his own party] has [V: criticized] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: for his actions] .
